title: Ticket #5897: Should some condor_q options imply -nobatch?
description:
Some condor_q options (such as -dag and -cputime) only have any effect in non-batch mode. I'm wondering whether specifying such an option should automatically put condor_q into non-batch mode.

At any rate, I'll be documenting this in the man page.

(Note: there may be a bunch of other options that fall into this category, but I haven't checked them all yet.)
creator: wenger
